What is the purpose of the `recoveryauthority` parameter when registering an identity in Verus?

The `recoveryauthority` parameter specifies an ID that will be able to revive the created ID if it is revoked. This ID can be an existing ID that is either under your own control or an ID that you trust to help you revive the ID in case it is revoked.
